person_say: I’m about to give an important presentation, but I’m really nervous. Do you have any tips for relaxation and focus?
animal_say: I know a wonderful bear named Bruno who specializes in mindfulness! Would you like to meet him to help you relax and focus before your presentation?

person_say: Yes, meeting Bruno sounds lovely! I would love to get some calming mindfulness tips from him.
animal_say: Great choice! Here comes Bruno, our calming bear friend, ready to help you find your inner peace and embrace the moment!
